thumb.name: True Friend
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EFor a Special Friend%3Cbr%3Eat Easter%3Cbr%3EWe've shared%3Cbr%3E the ups and downs%3Cbr%3Eof life.%3Cbr%3Eunderstood the%3Cbr%3E 'I-don't-feel-like-talking'%3Cbr%3Emoods. and created stories%3Cbr%3Eand memories we've enjoyed%3Cbr%3Eover and over again.%3Cbr%3EWe've helped%3Cbr%3E during the hard times.%3Cbr%3Ecelebrated the really%3Cbr%3Egreat times together.%3Cbr%3Eignored the crabbiness.%3Cbr%3Eand joined%3Cbr%3Ein the silliness%26#133;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EMy heart rejoices in the Lord;%3Cbr%3Ein the Lord my horn is lifted high.%3Cbr%3E1 SAMUEL 2:1%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThat's why.%3Cbr%3Eat Easter and always.%3Cbr%3EI celebrate our friendship%26#133;%3Cbr%3Ebecause true friends%3Cbr%3Elike you%3Cbr%3Eare the best friends of all!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Easter

thumb.name: Our Family's Prayer for You
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EThis is the daywhich the Lord has made;let us rejoice and be glad in it.%3Cbr%3EPsalms 118:24%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EOur family's prayer%3Cbr%3Eon Easter Day%26#133;%3Cbr%3E'May your joys be great.%3Cbr%3Eyour cares be few.%3Cbr%3EAnd may Our Lord%3Cbr%3Ewatch over you.'%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Easter. Nathan %3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Gift of Friendship
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI Thank God%3Cbr%3Efor Your Friendship.%3Cbr%3ELeslie%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EOn Easter.%3Cbr%3Ewhen the world celebrates%3Cbr%3Ethe blessings of God's love.%3Cbr%3Eyou will be in my thoughts%3Cbr%3Eand in my prayers.%3Cbr%3Efor surely He has blessed me%3Cbr%3Ewith the gift of your friendship.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Easter%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Color Your Easter with Love!
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAn Easter Coloring%3Cbr%3ECard%3Cbr%3Efor Natalie%3Cbr%3EEaster Day's a special day.%3Cbr%3EAnd you are special. too...%3Cb%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAnd that's just why%3Cbr%3Ethis card is filled%3Cbr%3EWith so much love for you!

thumb.name: An Easter Time Blessing
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EWishing You God's Blessings. David%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EGod is our refuge and strength%26#133;PSALMS 46:1 God bless you morning. noon. and night. God keep you in His care. God fill your heart with faith in Him And answer every prayer. Have a Blessed Easter%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Glad I Know You Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIt's Easter.%3Cbr%3EMicky.%3Cbr%3Eand I'm so glad%3Cbr%3Ewe know each other!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI'd hate to send%3Cbr%3E such a great card%3Cbr%3Eto a perfect stranger!%3Cbr%3EHappy Easter

thumb.name: Close in Heart
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EWith Warmest Thoughts of You. Chris. Across the Miles%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EThough miles may lie between us and the distance may be far. You're very close in heart and thought --just as you always are. Happy Easter%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Sending Hugs and Smiles
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3ERobin. this Easter. I'll be thinking about you%26#133;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%26#133;with a hug in my heart and an I'm-so-lucky-to-know-you smile.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: God Bless You
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EGod%3Cbr%3EBless%3Cbr%3EYou.%3Cbr%3EMarie%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWishing you...%3Cbr%3EA happy Easter.%3Cbr%3EA beautiful Spring.%3Cbr%3EAnd all the joys%3Cbr%3EThat His blessings%3Cbr%3Ecan bring.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: God's Gift of Love
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EWishing You%3Cbr%3EAll the Blessings of Easter.%3Cbr%3EElliot%3Cbr%3EFor He will give%3Cbr%3EHis ANGELS%3Cbr%3Echarge of you%3Cbr%3Eto GUARD you%3Cbr%3Ein all your ways.%3Cbr%3EPSALMS 91:11%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EThe wonder of the Resurrection%3Cbr%3Eis a beautiful reminder%3Cbr%3Eof God's gift of love.%3Cbr%3ERejoice in it%3Cbr%3Eand have a beautiful Easter!

thumb.name: Egg-stra Big Wishes!
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EIt's Easter!%3Cbr%3EKnock!%3Cbr%3EKnock!%3Cbr%3EWho's there?%3Cbr%3EEggs!%3Cbr%3EEggs who?%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EEggs-tra%3Cbr%3Ebig wishes%3Cbr%3Efor an Eggs-tra%3Cbr%3Especial day!

thumb.name: An Easter Prayer
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EGod Bless You%3Cbr%3Eat Easter and Always.%3Cbr%3EShelley%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EMay He who walks beside you%3Cbr%3Ein His gentle. caring way%3Cbr%3EGrant to you His lasting joy%3Cbr%3Ethis holy Easter Day...%3Cbr%3EAnd in the months to follow.%3Cbr%3Emay His loving spirit bless%3Cbr%3EYour heart with deep content%3Cbr%3Eand your days with happiness.
